title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
text: We are seeking a Senior Machine Learning Engineer to design and deploy ML models at scale. You will work on cutting-edge NLP and computer vision projects, collaborate with cross-functional teams, and mentor junior engineers.
description: Design, develop, and deploy machine learning models for production systems. Build scalable ML pipelines using Python, TensorFlow, and PyTorch. Collaborate with data scientists and software engineers to integrate ML solutions.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in machine learning. Strong proficiency in Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch. Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure). MS or PhD in Computer Science or related field preferred.

title: Frontend Developer
text: Join our fast-growing startup as a Frontend Developer. Build beautiful, responsive user interfaces using React and TypeScript. Work directly with designers and backend engineers in an agile environment.
description: Develop modern web applications using React, TypeScript, and Next.js. Implement pixel-perfect designs and ensure excellent user experience. Write clean, maintainable code and participate in code reviews.
requirements: 3+ years of frontend development experience. Expert knowledge of React, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3. Experience with state management (Redux, Zustand). Strong understanding of responsive design principles.
